results.text: Atan uqeîîi nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaâlken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW.
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet.
Degs ad wekkôen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven.
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqaô yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad".
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weêêan iyi d ar Öebbi nnwen, d Öebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waâbad n Mass is".
